mapper.insert: insert into bh_point_product(prodName, point, originFileName, uploadFileName, post_yn, createdAt) values(#{prodName}, #{point}, #{originFileName}, #{uploadFileName}, #{postYn}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bh_point_product WHERE LOWER(prodName) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{prodName}), '%') LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE bh_point_product SET prodName = #{prodName}, point = #{point}, originFileName = #{originFileName}, uploadFileName = #{uploadFileName}, post_yn = #{postYn}, createdAt = now() WHERE id = #{id}
